1.content:
"Now class, I want you to be extremely careful and pour the sodium bromide into your solution. Only put the correct amount in, no more, no less. Got it?"

You sigh as you listen to your chemistry teacher, Mr. Brent, drone on about your instructions. There were only four days of school left, why is it he's making you do work? Four more days, you remind yourself, four more days until you are a senior and one year from being out of here for good.

You try your best to at least get this experiment right. And A could really help your grade in this class. No matter how hard you focus, however, you can't quite mzke out everything the teacher says. It's always been hard to hear from the back of the classroom. Plus, with no one around you close enough for you to ask for help, you have to wing most of your experiment. Now did he say 30 milliliters of sodium bromide or was it sodium chloride? Guessing, you pour in the sodium chloride. Suddenly, the solution splashes all over you, covering you and your clothes. Damn, you really liked that shirt!

No one seems to notice the splash, which is good. You'd hate for Mr. Brent to yell at you again for spilling something. You grab some paper towels and wipe down your desk, cleaning the fluid from it.

As you clean, you notice the towel appears to be growing bigger... what brand is this? You look around in amazement as you see everything around you growing larger and larger! What's happening?!

Suddenly, you realize the world isn't growing, you're shrinking! The solution you spilled seems to have shrunk you! Luckly you got it on your clothes too, you'd hate to be naked in class!

When you stop shrinking you realize that you are now about three inches tall in a world of giants! What to do?

You know you have to find someone to help you, but who?

There's Julian who's not too far away. He is a little short, but obviosly still huge compared to you. He has tan skin, is very muscular, and wears black framed glasses. He can be a bit childish, but he would be sure to help
you.

There's also Shayne. Shayne is fairly tall and has a lean build with tan skin. He's very kind and is openly gay. You think he'd help you, but you're also pretty sure he has a crush on you...

There is a jock type guy named Daniel close by. He's huge compared to normal students in both height and muscle size, but isn't very bright. He has pale skin. If you want someone who could protect you at your size he'd probably be a good bet, but who knows what someone that size could do to you?

Mr. Brent may help you. He's in his mid thirties, is pale and a bit thin. He's a teacher who students don't seem to respect, but you've always bee good in class. He would help, right?

You could always go out into to halway too and look for someone there. But who knows who you'll bump into...

Or who'll bump into you...

"Yes its me. I need your help!"

A few hours later you were woken up by Julian removing yoi from his pocket. You looked around and saw yourself in a nice car.

Shayne looks down to find you. He looks surprised before he crouches down closer to your level. "...Gordon?" he asks quietly. "What happened to you?"

info.brief_description: You've shrunk! Who finds you and how will you survive in a world of giants?
info.description:
You're name is Gordon, and you have got it made. Looks, money, and a nice body. But one day when you get some chemicals on you during science, you notice some changes. Suddenly, you're a few inces tall and everyone around you is huge!! How will you survive in such a world? Will you find a gentle giant who will love and care for you, or a mean nasty person who sees this as a chance for payback?

This story will be ment for the writers to add whatever they wish. My only request is keep children and animals out of it. Other than that, have fun writing anything at all!

75 gift points for good, long chapters.
